Udonis Haslem signed his name, then Rafer Alston and so on down the line, each man using a black Sharpie on Dwyane Wade 's keepsake. Michael Beasley was one of the last teammates to emerge from the shower, and he never noticed Dwyane Wade when he tried to hand him the boot. "He broke his career high, Quentin Richardson said, "so he don't want to sign it!"
